net.sourceforge.cruisecontrol.publishers
Class KrazipIRCPublisher

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.cruisecontrol.publishers.KrazipIRCPublisher
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, net.sourceforge.cruisecontrol.Publisher
public class KrazipIRCPublisher
extends Object
implements net.sourceforge.cruisecontrol.Publisher

In short, Krazip is a CruiseControl plug-in for sending a CruiseControl build result into IRC server. However you can interact with Krazip via IRC channel by input Krazip known commands. Please refer to Krazip manual.

Krazip requires IRClib for working. (http://moepii.sourceforge.net/)

Author:
Pongvech Vechprasit (pun@abctech-thailand.com)
See Also:

Method Detail

publish

public final void publish(org.jdom.Element cruiseControlBuildLog)
                   throws net.sourceforge.cruisecontrol.CruiseControlException
The main method for publishing build result into IRC. Firstly, initialize an IRC connection, and then if the connection is OK, call sendMessage method. Which will build the message body by buildMessage method. Finally, send the message according to logging level setting.

Specified by:
publish in interface net.sourceforge.cruisecontrol.Publisher
Parameters:
cruiseControlBuildLog - - A CruiseControl build log
Throws:
net.sourceforge.cruisecontrol.CruiseControlException - on any error

Specified by:
validate in interface net.sourceforge.cruisecontrol.Publisher
Throws:
net.sourceforge.cruisecontrol.CruiseControlException - if there was a configuration error.
